*div1 type="summary"* *p*John Gibson to Austin, February 6, 1828. Bill of sale for a slave.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*Know all men by these presents that I *person_mentioned*John Gibson,*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*agent and attorney*/person_mentioned* for *person_mentioned*Madame Catherine de Vilemont*/person_mentioned* of *location_mentioned*Point Chicot*/location_mentioned* in the *location_mentioned*Territory of Arkansas*/location_mentioned* in the *location_mentioned*United States of the north*/location_mentioned*, for and in consideration of Three Hundred and fifty dollars the receipt whereof is hereby acknowledged, have bargained Sold and conveyed to *person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* his *person_mentioned*heirs */person_mentioned*and assigns a certain *person_mentioned*negro woman named Fatime*/person_mentioned* of about 40 years, a *person_mentioned*Slave */person_mentioned*for life the possession whereof I, as agent aforesaid do guarantee to the Said *person_mentioned*Austin */person_mentioned*his *person_mentioned*heirs */person_mentioned*and assigns against the claim of any person or persons whatsoever— In testimony whereof I have hereunto set my hand this *date_mentioned n="02-06-1828">Sixth day of February 1828*/date_mentioned* at the Town of *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin,*/location_mentioned* in the*location_mentioned* Colony of Austin*/location_mentioned* and the *location_mentioned*State of Cuahuila and Texas.*/location_mentioned* */p* *p**person_mentioned*John Gibson */person_mentioned* [Rubric] Attests*/p* *p**person_mentioned*H. H. League*/person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p**person_mentioned*J. B. Austin */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p* *p*[Indorsed by Austin:] Bill of Sale from *person_mentioned*John Gibson */person_mentioned*for *person_mentioned*negro woman alias Mary*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
